verses.verse: Then we turned, <S%H6437><s%> and took our journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me; <S%H5437><s%> and we encircled Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
"You have encircled <S%H5437><s%> this mountain <S%H2022><s%> long enough. <S%H7227><s%> Turn <S%H6437><s%> northward. <S%H6828><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5674><s%> 'You are to pass through the border <S%H1366><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir; <S%H8165><s%> and they will be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you: <S%H3966><s%> take good heed to yourselves therefore; <S%H8104><s%>

don't <S%H1624><s%> contend with them; <S%H5414><s%> for I will not give you of their land, <S%H776><s%> no, <S%H4096><s%> not so much as for the sole of the foot <S%H7272><s%> to tread on; <S%H5414><s%> because I have given Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

You shall purchase <S%H7666><s%> food <S%H400><s%> of them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that you may eat; <S%H398><s%> and you shall also buy <S%H3739><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that you may drink. <S%H8354><s%>'"

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand; <S%H3027><s%> he has known <S%H3045><s%> your walking <S%H3212><s%> through this great <S%H1419><s%> wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has been with you; <S%H2637><s%> you have lacked nothing. <S%H1697><s%>

So we passed <S%H5674><s%> by from our brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> from Elath <S%H359><s%> and from Ezion Geber. <S%H6100><s%> We turned <S%H6437><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6696><s%> "Don't bother Moab, <S%H4124><s%> neither contend <S%H1624><s%> with them in battle; <S%H4421><s%> for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you of his land <S%H776><s%> for a possession; <S%H3425><s%> because I have given <S%H5414><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>"
(The Emim <S%H368><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> therein before, <S%H6440><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakim: <S%H6062><s%>
these <S%H1992><s%> also are accounted <S%H2803><s%> Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> as the Anakim; <S%H6062><s%> but the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Emim. <S%H368><s%>

The Horites <S%H2752><s%> also lived <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%> before, <S%H6440><s%> but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them; <S%H8045><s%> and they destroyed them from before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in their place; <S%H3478><s%> as Israel did <S%H6213><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession, <S%H3425><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave to them. <S%H5414><s%>)
"Now rise up, <S%H6965><s%> and cross over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%>" We went over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> in which we came <S%H1980><s%> from Kadesh Barnea, <S%H6947><s%> until we had come <S%H1980><s%> over the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered, <S%H2218><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> - eight <S%H8083><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> until all the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were consumed <S%H8552><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore to them. <S%H7650><s%>
Moreover the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was against them, <S%H2000><s%> to destroy them from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> until they were consumed. <S%H8552><s%>
So it happened, <S%H582><s%> when all the men of war <S%H4421><s%> were consumed <S%H8552><s%> and dead <S%H4191><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>
that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
"You are <S%H6144><s%> this day to pass over <S%H5674><s%> Ar, <S%H6144><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%>

and when you come near <S%H7126><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> don't <S%H6696><s%> bother them, <S%H1624><s%> nor contend with them; <S%H5414><s%> for I will not give you of the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> for a possession; <S%H3425><s%> because I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>"

(That also is accounted <S%H2803><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of Rephaim: <S%H7497><s%> Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> therein before; <S%H6440><s%> but the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Zamzummim, <S%H2157><s%>

a people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakim; <S%H6062><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> them; <S%H3423><s%> and they succeeded them, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in their place;

as he did <S%H6213><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> when he destroyed <S%H8045><s%> the Horites <S%H2752><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them; <S%H3423><s%> and they succeeded them, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in their place even to this day: <S%H3117><s%>

and the Avvim, <S%H5761><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in villages <S%H2699><s%> as far as Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> the Caphtorim, <S%H3732><s%> who came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Caphtor, <S%H3731><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in their place.)

"Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> take your journey, <S%H5265><s%> and pass over <S%H5674><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon: <S%H769><s%> behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and his land; <S%H776><s%> begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H1624><s%> and contend with him in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

This day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> of you and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of you on the peoples <S%H6440><s%> who are under the whole sky, <S%H8064><s%> who shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the report <S%H8088><s%> of you, <S%H7264><s%> and shall tremble, and be in anguish <S%H2342><s%> because of you. <S%H6440><s%>"

I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> along by the highway, <S%H1870><s%> I will turn <S%H5493><s%> neither to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

You shall sell <S%H7666><s%> me food <S%H400><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may eat; <S%H398><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may drink: <S%H8354><s%> only let me pass through <S%H5674><s%> on my feet, <S%H7272><s%>

as the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ar, <S%H6144><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to me; <S%H5674><s%> until I shall pass over the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> gives us. <S%H5414><s%>"

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not let us pass <S%H5674><s%> by him; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> hardened <S%H7185><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and made his heart <S%H3824><s%> obstinate, <S%H553><s%> that he might deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> as at this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> "Behold, I have begun <S%H2490><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> up Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H2490><s%> begin to possess, <S%H3423><s%> that you may inherit <S%H3423><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>"
Then Sihon <S%H5511><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us, <S%H5971><s%> he and all his people, to battle <S%H4421><s%> at Jahaz. <S%H3096><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him up before <S%H6440><s%> us; <S%H5221><s%> and we struck him, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons, and all his people. <S%H5971><s%>

We took <S%H3920><s%> all his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> every inhabited <S%H4962><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> with the women <S%H802><s%> and the little ones; <S%H2945><s%> we left <S%H7604><s%> none remaining: <S%H8300><s%>
only the livestock <S%H929><s%> we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> to ourselves, <S%H7998><s%> with the spoil of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which we had taken. <S%H3920><s%>

From Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the valley, <S%H5158><s%> even to Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> there was not a city <S%H7151><s%> too high <S%H7682><s%> for us; <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> up all before us: <S%H6440><s%>

only to the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> you didn't <S%H7126><s%> come near; <S%H3027><s%> all the side of the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> and wherever Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> forbade us. <S%H6680><s%>
